text: Old Dailly is a village in South Ayrshire, Scotland. It is located west of Dailly (or "New Dailly"). The Charter or Blue stones of Old Dailly in Ayrshire are located in the cemetery of Old Dailly church.Love, Dane (2009). Legendary Ayrshire. Custom: Folklore: Tradition. Auchinleck : Carn Publishing. pp. 16 - 17. The local folklore legend known as "The Charles" is also said to visit the town ==References== ==External links== *Video of the Old Dailly Blue Stones *Video footage of Old Dailly Kirk Category:Villages in Carrick, Scotland
title: Old Dailly
